channel.title: Docs on Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Documentation

item.description: Getting Started with Productboard # Access Link: https://securonixinc.productboard.com/insights/notes/all-notes Productboard is a dedicated product management system that helps you align everyone on the right features to build next. Currently, we have multiple communication channels for customer feedback, requests as well as internal communication so some data might be lost and it might not get prioritized properly. Productboard helps with this aspect by consolidating all data in one place and also helps using that insights to prioritise and build new features.

Getting Started with Productboard # Access Link: https://securonixinc.productboard.com/insights/notes/all-notes Productboard is a dedicated product management system that helps you align everyone on the right features to build next. Currently, we have multiple communication channels for customer feedback, requests as well as internal communication so some data might be lost and it might not get prioritized properly. Productboard helps with this aspect by consolidating all data in one place and also helps using that insights to prioritise and build new features.
